about_the_game:
"Eternal Palace Sakura" is a rogue-lite 3D action game where you strengthen your character while progressing through dungeons, offering an exhilarating and flashy 3D action experience.

Take control of Retla, a brown-skinned, cat-eared, dual-wielding hooded heroine, and challenge the mystical dream dungeon!

Game Features

Cool and Cute Characters in a 3D Rogue-lite Action Game!

High-quality anime-style characters and animations. The carefully crafted cutscenes add flair to your gameplay, bringing the story and action to life!

Easy Controls for Exciting 3D Action

Mash buttons for simple combos! You can choose to dodge enemy attacks, block with your shield, or go all out with aggressive strikes. With intuitive controls, you can create your own unique tactics and strategies for battle.

Activate Over-Tension!

When the tension gauge is maxed out, it's time to trigger Over-Tension! Unleash the special move "Over Arts" to annihilate your enemies in a single strike!

Collect Power-Up Items called "Attributes"!

Gather a variety of power-up items to enhance your abilities and unlock new actions. Even if you don’t get the perfect build, finding the optimal setup for each situation is part of the fun. Use your best builds to overcome the toughest challenges!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Eternal Palace Sakura" is a rogue-lite 3D action game where you power up your character and take on thrilling dungeon challenges packed with flashy combat. Step into the shoes of Retla, a brown-skinned, cat-eared dual-wielder, and explore the ever-shifting dream labyrinth!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
